Package Brick.Break.Player

Class PlayerController

java.lang.Object
Brick.Break.Player.PlayerController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Move
public class PlayerController
extends java.lang.Object
implements Move
This is the Controller of Model class(Player Class) in Player MVC design pattern. This class implement the methods from "Move" interface class.

    private Player playerModel  
    private PlayerView playerView

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.awt.Point getControllerBallPoint()
    This is a getter method which get the ball position from the model class(Player class).

    This is a getter method which get maximum from the model class(Player class).
    int getControllerMinimum()
    This is a getter method which get minimum from the model class(Player class).
    int getControllerMoveAmount()
    This is a getter method which get the amount of movement of the player from the model class(Player class).
    java.awt.Color getPlayerBorderColour()
    This is a getter method which get the border colour of the player from the model class(Player class).
    java.awt.Rectangle getPlayerControllerFace()
    This is a getter method which get the rectangle of the player from the model class(Player class).
    java.awt.Color getPlayerInnerColour()
    This is a getter method which get the inner colour of the player from the model class(Player class).
    boolean impact​(BallController b)
    This method is used to determined if the ball have or have not hit the rectangle(Player).
    java.awt.Rectangle makeRectangle​(int width, int height)
    This method is used to create the player which is the long green rectangle holding the ball in the games.
    void move()
    This method is used to make the ball move whenever the player start the game.
    void moveLeft()
    This method is used to move the rectangle(Player) to the left.
    void moveRight()
    This method is used to move the rectangle(Player) to the right.
    void moveTo​(java.awt.Point p)
    This method is used to move the rectangle(Player) and the ball to a specific place.
    void renderPlayer​(java.awt.Graphics2D g2d)
    This method get the "drawPlayer" method from "PlayerView" class and draw out the rectangle(Player) to the screen.
    void stop()
    This method is used to make the rectangle(Rectangle) stop moving.

  • Constructor Details

    • PlayerController

      public PlayerController​(Player playerModel)
      This is the constructor of "PlayerController" class. This constructor will set the default value for the data in model class(Player class) once it is called by another class.
      Parameters:
      playerModel - This parameter is the object of model class(Player class).

  • Method Details

    • makeRectangle

      public java.awt.Rectangle makeRectangle​(int width, int height)
      This method is used to create the player which is the long green rectangle holding the ball in the games.
      Parameters:
      width - This parameter determined the width of the rectangle.
      height - This parameter determined the height of the rectangle.
      Returns:
      new Rectangle(x,y,width,height)

    • impact

      public boolean impact​(BallController b)
      This method is used to determined if the ball have or have not hit the rectangle(Player).
      Parameters:
      b - this parameter is the object of "BallController" class.
      Returns:
      either false or true.

    • move

      public void move()
      This method is used to make the ball move whenever the player start the game. This method comes from "Move" interface class.
      Specified by:
      move in interface Move

    • moveLeft

      public void moveLeft()
      This method is used to move the rectangle(Player) to the left. This method move the rectangle(Player) to the left by setting the move amount of the rectangle(Player) to -5 everytime it moves.

    • moveRight

      public void moveRight()
      This method is used to move the rectangle(Player) to the right. This method move the rectangle(Player) to the right by setting the move amount of the rectangle(Player) to 5 everytime it moves.

    • stop

      public void stop()
      This method is used to make the rectangle(Rectangle) stop moving. When the rectangle(Player) stop moving, the move amount of the rectangle(Player) will be set to 0;

    • moveTo

      public void moveTo​(java.awt.Point p)
      This method is used to move the rectangle(Player) and the ball to a specific place.
      Parameters:
      p - This parameter is the point where the ball and rectangle(Player) should move to.

    • renderPlayer

      public void renderPlayer​(java.awt.Graphics2D g2d)
      This method get the "drawPlayer" method from "PlayerView" class and draw out the rectangle(Player) to the screen.

    • getPlayerInnerColour

      public java.awt.Color getPlayerInnerColour()
      This is a getter method which get the inner colour of the player from the model class(Player class).
      Returns:
      "INNER_COLOR" from model class (Player class)
